trends: There have been 5 other sightings in North Richland Hills
There were no other sightings in North Richland Hills on or around January 14th 2008
Summary: A black dot popped out the sky and then desappeared. Then it came back descending with lights on the bottom of it.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside on my driveway a little before 6:00 jumping rope and watching the airplanes. Then I saw a black dot appear next to one of the airplanes. I stopped jumping rope so that I could get a clearer picture. Then I looked away for a couple of seconds and it was gone. Then I ran inside to tell my Dad and my coach what I had seen, but they did not believe me. So I went back to jump some more and I saw it again. This time I saw it with lights on the bottom of it and it slowly descended until it went out of sight. The next day, my coach sent an email saying that maybe they should not have dismissed my UFO sighting so quickly. There had been many sighting reported about the same time as I had seen it.
